name: Wirtschaftsverband der deutschen Kautschukindustrie e.V.
membership: Unser Verband ist Repräsentant Deutschlands in der European Tyre and Rubber Manufacturers Association ETRMA.
goal: Wirtschaftspolitische und technische Interessenvertretung der Unternehmen der Kautschuk- und Elastomerbranche Deutschlands.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives:
- European Tyre Labelling Regulation (EC/1222/2009)
- A European Strategy for Plastics in a Circular Economy (COM/2018/028 final)
- Restriction proposal for intentionally added microplastics in the EU – update (ECHA/NR/19/28)
- ECHA Consultation on Polycyclic-aromatic hydrocarbons (PAH) in Rubber Granules and Mulches - (https://echa.europa.eu/registry-of-restriction-intentions/-/dislist/details/0b0236e181d5746d)
